comments.body: You would need to rebaseline these after you merge master as now it baselines errors and output so we don't have to hardcode those errors everytime those change.
And sorry about the casing.. You want to change casing for `initial-Build` to `initial-build` as otherwise tests fail on linux

I think you want to use `verifyTscIncrementalEdits` passing in   `incrementalScenarios` as array with literal containing buildKind and modifyFs you have in next tsc command, so that it first builds this scenario and then makes changes and builds incremental edit scenario. (currently your next test case is running as if the initial fs before any build had the changes per modifyFs).
